00054 #include "nut_io.h"
00055 
00056 #include <errno.h>
00057 #include <io.h>
00058 #include <stdlib.h>
00059 #include <memdebug.h>
00060 
00065 
00076 int fclose(FILE * stream)
00077 {
00078     int rc = EOF;
00079     uint_fast8_t i;
00080 
00081     /*
00082      * Search the list first to detect bad stream pointer.
00083      */
00084     if (stream == 0) {
00085         errno = EBADF;
00086         return EOF;
00087     }
00088     for (i = 0; __iob[i] != stream;) {
00089         if (++i >= FOPEN_MAX) {
00090             errno = EBADF;
00091             return EOF;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     /*
00096      * Ignore unopened standard streams.
00097      */
00098     //if ((void *) stream < RAMSTART)
00099     //    return 0;
00100 
00101     /*
00102      * Close the file or device.
00103      */
00104     if (_close(stream->iob_fd) == 0)
00105         rc = 0;
00106     free(stream);
00107     __iob[i] = 0;
00108 
00109     return rc;
00110 }
